label: [{"start":0,"end":6,"text":"禽溃疡性肠炎","labels":["disease"]},{"start":8,"end":11,"text":"肠梭菌","labels":["disease"]},{"start":28,"end":36,"text":"急性细菌性传染病","labels":["disease"]},{"start":13,"end":16,"text":"幼年鸡","labels":["type"]},{"start":17,"end":19,"text":"火鸡","labels":["type"]}]
text: 禽溃疡性肠炎是由肠梭菌引起幼年鸡、火鸡和鹤鹑等鸟类的一种急性细菌性传染病。

label: [{"start":1,"end":5,"text":"突然发病","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":6,"end":12,"text":"迅速大量死亡","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":18,"end":30,"text":"大小不一的黄白色坏死斑点","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":23,"end":26,"text":"黄白色","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":31,"end":36,"text":"肠黏膜出血","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":34,"end":36,"text":"出血","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":37,"end":45,"text":"有黄白色的溃疡灶","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":38,"end":41,"text":"黄白色","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":13,"end":15,"text":"肝脏","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":31,"end":34,"text":"肠黏膜","labels":["bodypart"]}]
text: 以突然发病，迅速大量死亡，肝脏表面有大小不一的黄白色坏死斑点，肠黏膜出血和有黄白色的溃疡灶为特征。

label: [{"start":9,"end":15,"text":"禽溃疡性肠炎","labels":["disease"]}]
text: 随着养鸡业的发展，禽溃疡性肠炎的发生呈上升趋势。

label: [{"start":0,"end":1,"text":"鸡","labels":["type"]},{"start":5,"end":7,"text":"火鸡","labels":["type"]},{"start":8,"end":10,"text":"野鸡","labels":["type"]}]
text: 鸡、鹌鹑、火鸡、野鸡、鸽均易感，尤以鹧鸪最为易感。

label: [{"start":5,"end":9,"text":"发病幼禽","labels":["type"]},{"start":10,"end":12,"text":"粪便","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":21,"end":24,"text":"消化道","labels":["bodypart"]}]
text: 主要是由于发病幼禽的粪便污染了饲料饮水，经消化道而感染：

label: [{"start":9,"end":11,"text":"病禽","labels":["type"]}]
text: 在同一养殖场，其他病禽也可成为主要传染来源。

label: [{"start":3,"end":9,"text":"禽溃疡性肠炎","labels":["disease"]}]
text: 蚊蝇是禽溃疡性肠炎的传播媒介。饲料腐败，卫生条件不良，阴雨潮湿都是诱发因素。

label: [{"start":0,"end":2,"text":"病禽","labels":["type"]}]
text: 病禽常常突然死亡，尤以幼龄鹤鹑为明显。

label: [{"start":0,"end":2,"text":"病鸡","labels":["type"]},{"start":2,"end":6,"text":"表现不安","labels":["symptom"]},{"start":7,"end":9,"text":"弓背","labels":["symptom"]},{"start":10,"end":14,"text":"精神萎靡","labels":["symptom"]},{"start":15,"end":18,"text":"眼半闭","labels":["symptom"]},{"start":16,"end":18,"text":"半闭","labels":["symptom"]},{"start":19,"end":23,"text":"羽毛松乱","labels":["symptom"]},{"start":21,"end":23,"text":"松乱","labels":["symptom"]},{"start":24,"end":28,"text":"行动缓慢","labels":["symptom"]},{"start":29,"end":31,"text":"腹泻","labels":["symptom"]},{"start":8,"end":9,"text":"背","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":15,"end":16,"text":"眼","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":19,"end":21,"text":"羽毛","labels":["bodypart"]}]
text: 病鸡表现不安，弓背，精神萎靡，眼半闭，羽毛松乱，行动缓慢，腹泻。如不及时救治，致死率可达100%。

label: [{"start":4,"end":14,"text":"肠道有许多圆形的溃疡","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":9,"end":14,"text":"圆形的溃疡","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":19,"end":24,"text":"肠内有出血","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":22,"end":24,"text":"出血","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":33,"end":37,"text":"肠壁穿孔","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":35,"end":37,"text":"穿孔","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":39,"end":42,"text":"腹膜炎","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":4,"end":6,"text":"肠道","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":19,"end":20,"text":"肠","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":33,"end":35,"text":"肠壁","labels":["bodypart"]}]
text: 剖检可见肠道有许多圆形的溃疡，有的病例肠内有出血，严重的病例可造成肠壁穿孔引起腹膜炎。

label: [{"start":0,"end":10,"text":"肝脏有黄色局限性病灶","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":5,"end":10,"text":"局限性病灶","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":3,"end":5,"text":"黄色","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":11,"end":16,"text":"花斑状病灶","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":21,"end":32,"text":"肝脏有许多小的黄色病灶","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":30,"end":32,"text":"病灶","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":28,"end":30,"text":"黄色","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":33,"end":36,"text":"脾肿大","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":34,"end":36,"text":"肿大","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":37,"end":39,"text":"出血","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":0,"end":2,"text":"肝脏","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":21,"end":23,"text":"肝脏","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":33,"end":34,"text":"脾","labels":["bodypart"]}]
text: 肝脏有黄色局限性病灶或花斑状病灶，有的病例肝脏有许多小的黄色病灶。脾肿大，出血。

label: [{"start":26,"end":32,"text":"禽溃疡性肠炎","labels":["disease"]}]
text: 根据发病特点、临床症状、病理变化并结合细菌学检查进行禽溃疡性肠炎的诊断。

label: [{"start":15,"end":17,"text":"消毒","labels":["control"]},{"start":26,"end":29,"text":"百毒杀","labels":["drug"]},{"start":34,"end":37,"text":"安唯消","labels":["drug"]},{"start":40,"end":43,"text":"来苏尔","labels":["drug"]}]
text: (1)预防。每周对禽舍进行1次消毒，可选用0.10%百毒杀0.10%安唯消或5%来苏尔等。

label: [{"start":2,"end":11,"text":"保持禽舍的清洁卫生","labels":["control"]},{"start":12,"end":18,"text":"定期清除粪便","labels":["control"]},{"start":30,"end":38,"text":"保持禽舍相对干燥","labels":["control"]},{"start":16,"end":18,"text":"粪便","labels":["bodypart"]}]
text: 平时保持禽舍的清洁卫生，定期清除粪便，避免饲料、饮水受污染，保持禽舍相对干燥；

label: [{"start":0,"end":11,"text":"鹧鸪与其他禽类分开饲养","labels":["control"]},{"start":14,"end":18,"text":"网上饲养","labels":["control"]},{"start":19,"end":21,"text":"笼养","labels":["control"]},{"start":5,"end":7,"text":"禽类","labels":["type"]},{"start":24,"end":26,"text":"粪便","labels":["bodypart"]}]
text: 鹧鸪与其他禽类分开饲养。采用网上饲养和笼养，减少粪便对饲料和饮水的污染。

label: [{"start":5,"end":8,"text":"氯霉素","labels":["drug"]},{"start":17,"end":20,"text":"链霉素","labels":["drug"]},{"start":27,"end":29,"text":"混饲","labels":["control"]}]
text: 饲料中添加氯霉素(500g/t)或链霉素(60g/t)混饲。

label: [{"start":21,"end":25,"text":"拌料投喂","labels":["control"]},{"start":33,"end":39,"text":"禽溃疡性肠炎","labels":["disease"]},{"start":8,"end":11,"text":"氯霉素","labels":["drug"]},{"start":12,"end":15,"text":"痢特灵","labels":["drug"]},{"start":16,"end":20,"text":"泰乐菌素","labels":["drug"]}]
text: (2)治疗。选用氯霉素、痢特灵、泰乐菌素等拌料投喂3天，可有效治疗禽溃疡性肠炎。

label: [{"start":4,"end":12,"text":"改善饲养管理条件","labels":["control"]},{"start":13,"end":23,"text":"增加多种维生素的用量","labels":["control"]},{"start":17,"end":20,"text":"维生素","labels":["drug"]},{"start":26,"end":28,"text":"球虫","labels":["disease"]}]
text: 同时注意改善饲养管理条件，增加多种维生素的用量及防止球虫的继发感染。
